title: Opening Party
description: Join us for the tournament opening celebration with live music and special guests. All teams and fans are welcome to attend this special event marking the beginning of our tournament.

title: Fan Zone Opening
description: The official fan zone opens with activities, games, and food stalls for all supporters. Come experience the tournament atmosphere with fellow fans and enjoy various activities for all ages.

title: Mid-Tournament Concert
description: Special concert featuring local bands and international artists to celebrate the tournament. This will be the biggest musical event of the tournament with performances from top artists.
